Name: Getaway Island
About the game: What if the person you are with wants more than you? Would you feel pressured to comply? Maybe winding up stranded on an island is just what you need to figure things out. But what if that island was filled with three other beautiful women? Love isn't always easy. Would you stay loyal to the one you loved back home or would you forge a new relationship? On Getaway Island, time is your ally, so relax and enjoy your stay. The decision is up to you! Getaway Island features the following: A complete story with two unique endings Three beautiful women to meet and romance A tailored date for each woman Multiple choices peppered throughout the game 15 unique CG scenes to unlock 3 Hidden bonus CG scenes to uncover Steam Trading Card support Steam Cloud support
